rows.label: tlk44300083_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Have you heard? They say that
the Luxurian royals are not, after
all, descended from Adel...

rows.label: tlk44300083_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I was using talk of our Addamite
history and this castle's solidity
to try and win over this girl...

rows.label: tlk44300083_02_msg0003
rows.name:
But when she told me about the
descendant thing, it was my heart's
mighty ramparts that crumbled away...

rows.label: tlk44300083_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Though I'm rather pleased she even
spoke to me at all! My ramparts will
be soaring again in no time.
